ygData.subject: Q: Odd situation...?
ygData.msgSnippet: My husband and I play EQ on a networked setup.  We created our characters at the same time, we re both Wood Elf Druids.  We distributed our extra 30 stat
ygData.messageBody:
My husband and I play EQ on a networked setup. We created our
characters at the same time, we're both Wood Elf Druids. We
distributed our extra 30 stat points the same. We group most of the
time so level just about the same time. We even have the same AC and
HP within a couple of points. We've been keeping track of our
numerical stats/skills and he's actually a bit *better* than I am in
most abilities, including 1H blunt and most spell casting. However -
he gets the snot beat out of him all the time. He "misses" a *LOT*,
even when I'm fighting something and he's come up behind it. When he
does hit he hits for 6 and 7 points avg, where I avg. 10 or 11... The
only *real* difference between his character and mine is the
gender..... Any ideas *what* the deal is? Oh, other things we've
checked: Weight allowance - carrying minimal amount. Carrying
something detrimental - nothing that I can see.

Very confused,
Lliani, 6th level Druid of Kelethin, Karana server.
